metadata.title: CVE-2019-14751 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
NLTK Downloader before 3.4.5 is vulnerable to a directory traversal,allowing attackers to write arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in anNLTK package (ZIP archive) that is mishandled during extraction.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-nltk - 3.2.5-1ubuntu0.1
python3-nltk - 3.2.5-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nltk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.5-1ubuntu0.1').
